name: HBT Financial, Inc.
description: HBT Financial, Inc. is a financial holding company that operates as the parent company of Heartland Bank and Trust Company. Established to provide a comprehensive range of financial services to individuals and businesses, HBT Financial focuses on community banking and has a strong commitment to customer service and local engagement. Founded in 2011 and headquartered in Bloomington, Illinois, the company has grown steadily through both organic growth and strategic acquisitions. HBT Financial offers a wide array of products, including personal banking, commercial banking, mortgage services, and wealth management. Its community-focused approach enables it to tailor financial solutions to meet the specific needs of its clients, from small businesses to individuals. The company prides itself on its strong community ties and dedication to fostering economic development in the regions it serves. With a commitment to innovation, HBT Financial leverages technology to enhance customer experiences, streamline operations, and improve accessibility to banking services. The company is also focused on ensuring compliance with regulatory standards while maintaining a robust risk management framework. As HBT Financial continues to expand, it remains dedicated to its mission of providing exceptional banking services and contributing positively to the communities in which it operates.
